item.title: Chain Snatching Prevention Tips: Stay Safe in Public
item.description: Chain snatching is one of the fastest-growing street crimes across India. It happens suddenly, often within seconds, and leaves the victim shocked, shaken, and sometimes even injured. The criminals involved in chain snatching usually work in pairs or small groups and target vulnerable individuals in public spaces.
